review: Okay, Save your money for now...I have Roku and AppleTV, so what's next, hey lets buy Google Chromecast!WRONG...Concept is there, but that's all...My Favorite is Roku by far, AppleTV a VERY distant 2nd.Anything you can do on Google Chromecast, Roku can do better.What you want to do on AppleTV, you cannot so switch over to HDMI 1 where I have my Roku so I can...Sorry guys, that's my opinion and I have all three of these devices and know by first hand experience what shows and what blows.
author: Daniel J

review: I saw the commercials for this product on television and did research on their website.  It was very easy to install and configure to my home network and very easy to use with YouTube and Netflix.  I don't have Hulu but I think it would be as easy to connect as it was to the other 2 sites.I still haven't figured out how to cast with Amazon streaming.  I also thought you could cast your personal videos taken on your phone but I haven't figured out how.I bought 2 for my house and 3 as gifts.  If I could get my family using these more to view their favorite shows, I may be able to save money on my cable bill.  I would highly recommend this device to any one who wants better television options than just cable or Dish.
